Field.Name: MASTER_PAD_VERSION
Field.Title: PAD Version
Field.ShortDescription: PAD specification version that the PAD file complies with
Field.RegExDocumentation: Decimal major and minor version numbers with separator (.)

Field.Name: MASTER_PAD_EDITOR
Field.Title: PAD Editor
Field.ShortDescription: Name of tool producing PAD file

Field.Name: MASTER_PAD_INFO
Field.Title: PAD Comment
Field.ShortDescription: Information on how to find out more about PAD

Field.Name: Company_Name
Field.Title: Company name
Field.ShortDescription: Company name or, if no company name, author name

Field.Name: Address_1
Field.Title: Address
Field.ShortDescription: First line of the mailing address

Field.Name: Address_2
Field.Title: Address 2nd line
Field.ShortDescription: Second line of the mailing address, optional

Field.Name: City_Town
Field.Title: City or town
Field.ShortDescription: City, town or village

Field.Name: State_Province
Field.Title: State
Field.ShortDescription: State, province or region

Field.Name: Zip_Postal_Code
Field.Title: ZIP
Field.ShortDescription: ZIP or Postal code

Field.Name: Country
Field.Title: Country
Field.ShortDescription: Country

Field.Name: Company_WebSite_URL
Field.Title: Website
Field.ShortDescription: Company website URL

Field.Name: Author_First_Name
Field.Title: Author first name
Field.ShortDescription: Author's first name

Field.Name: Author_Last_Name
Field.Title: Author last name
Field.ShortDescription: Author's last name

Field.Name: Author_Email
Field.Title: Author email
Field.ShortDescription: Author's email address

Field.Name: Contact_First_Name
Field.Title: Contact first name
Field.ShortDescription: First name of the person that should be used to contact the company regarding this product

Field.Name: Contact_Last_Name
Field.Title: Contact last name
Field.ShortDescription: Last name of the person that should be used to contact the company regarding this product

Field.Name: Contact_Email
Field.Title: Contact email
Field.ShortDescription: Email address of the person that should be used to contact the company regarding this product

Field.Name: Sales_Email
Field.Title: Sales email
Field.ShortDescription: Email address where sales inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: Support_Email
Field.Title: Support email
Field.ShortDescription: Email address where technical support inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: General_Email
Field.Title: General email
Field.ShortDescription: Email address where general inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: Sales_Phone
Field.Title: Sales phone
Field.ShortDescription: Phone number where sales inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: Support_Phone
Field.Title: Support phone
Field.ShortDescription: Phone number where technical support inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: General_Phone
Field.Title: General phone
Field.ShortDescription: Phone number where general inquiries should be directed

Field.Name: Fax_Phone
Field.Title: Fax
Field.ShortDescription: Fax number

Field.Name: Program_Name
Field.Title: Program name
Field.ShortDescription: Full name of the program WITHOUT version numbers

Field.Name: Program_Version
Field.Title: Version
Field.ShortDescription: Version number of the product, should NOT contain the 'v.' characters

Field.Name: Program_Release_Month
Field.Title: Release month
Field.ShortDescription: Month that the program was released. Must be 2 digits: 01-12

Field.Name: Program_Release_Day
Field.Title: Release day
Field.ShortDescription: Day of the month the program was released. Must be 2 digits: 01-31

Field.Name: Program_Release_Year
Field.Title: Release year
Field.ShortDescription: Year the program was released. Must be a 4 digit year: 1900-2199

Field.Name: Program_Cost_Dollars
Field.Title: Cost amount
Field.ShortDescription: Numerical cost of the program in US Dollars, without currency symbol

Field.Name: Program_Cost_Other_Code
Field.Title: Cost other currency
Field.ShortDescription: International code used for Cost other
Field.RegExDocumentation: Three letter currency code, must be selected from list

Field.Name: Program_Cost_Other
Field.Title: Cost other
Field.ShortDescription: Numerical cost of the program in currency other than US Dollars, without currency symbol

Field.Name: Program_Type
Field.Title: Type
Field.ShortDescription: Type of program
Field.RegExDocumentation: Program type identifier, must be selected from list

Field.Name: Program_Release_Status
Field.Title: Status
Field.ShortDescription: Release status of the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: Release status identifier, must be selected from list

Field.Name: Program_Install_Support
Field.Title: Install
Field.ShortDescription: Type of install support the program has
Field.RegExDocumentation: Install support identifier, must be selected from list
Field.RegEx: ^(Install and Uninstall|Install Only|No Install Support|Uninstall Only)\Z

Field.Name: Program_OS_Support
Field.Title: Operating Systems
Field.ShortDescription: Operating systems supported by the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: Operating system identifiers, must be selected from list
Field.RegEx: ^((Win 3\.1x|Win95|Win98|WinME|WinNT 3\.x|WinNT 4\.x|WinXP|Windows2000|Windows2003|Windows Tablet PC Edition 2005|Windows Media Center Edition 2005|Windows Vista Starter|Windows Vista Home Basic|Windows Vista Home Premium|Windows Vista Business|Windows Vista Enterprise|Windows Vista Ultimate|Windows Vista Home Basic x64|Windows Vista Home Premium x64|Windows Vista Business x64|Windows Vista Enterprise x64|Windows Vista Ultimate x64|Windows CE|Windows Mobile 2003|Windows Mobile 2005|Unix|Linux|Linux Console|Linux Gnome|Linux GPL|Linux Open Source|MS-DOS|AS\/400|OS\/2|OS\/2 Warp|OS\/2 Warp 4|MAC 68k|Mac PPC|Mac OS 9|Mac OS X|Mac OS X 10\.1|Mac OS X 10\.2|Mac OS X 10\.3|Mac OS X 10\.4|Mac OS X 10\.5|Mac Other|Palm OS 1\.0|Palm OS 2\.0|Palm OS 2\.1|Palm OS 3\.0|Palm OS 3\.1|Palm OS 3\.2|Palm OS 4\.0|Palm OS 5\.0|Palm OS 6\.0|Pocket PC|RIM|Symbian|OpenVMS|Netware|BEOS|Java|Android|Handheld\/Mobile Other|Not Applicable)[, ]*)+\Z

Field.Name: Program_Language
Field.Title: Languages
Field.ShortDescription: Languages supported by the program user interface
Field.RegExDocumentation: Language identifiers, must be selected from list

Field.Name: File_Size_Bytes
Field.Title: Size Bytes
Field.ShortDescription: Size of the distribution file in Bytes

Field.Name: File_Size_K
Field.Title: Size KB
Field.ShortDescription: Size of the distribution file in Kilobytes

Field.Name: File_Size_MB
Field.Title: Size MB
Field.ShortDescription: Size of the distribution file in Megabytes

Field.Name: Has_Expire_Info
Field.Title: Has expire information
Field.ShortDescription: Used to determine if the program has expiration parameters

Field.Name: Expire_Count
Field.Title: Expire count
Field.ShortDescription: Number of days or uses until program expires

Field.Name: Expire_Based_On
Field.Title: Expire base
Field.ShortDescription: Type of expiration
Field.RegExDocumentation: Expiration type identifier, must be selected from list

Field.Name: Expire_Other_Info
Field.Title: Expire other
Field.ShortDescription: Other important information regarding expiration of the program

Field.Name: Expire_Month
Field.Title: Expire month
Field.ShortDescription: Month that the program will expire. Must be 2 digits: 01-12

Field.Name: Expire_Day
Field.Title: Expire day
Field.ShortDescription: Day of the month the program will expire. Must be 2 digits: 01-31

Field.Name: Expire_Year
Field.Title: Expire year
Field.ShortDescription: Year the program will expire. Must be a 4 digit year: 1900-2199

Field.Name: Program_Change_Info
Field.Title: Change info
Field.ShortDescription: Changes since the last release

Field.Name: Program_Category_Class
Field.Title: Category: class and subclass
Field.ShortDescription: Category class that best fits the application
Field.RegExDocumentation: Category class identifier, must be selected from list
Field.RegEx: ^(Audio & Multimedia::Audio Encoders\/Decoders|Audio & Multimedia::Audio File Players|Audio & Multimedia::Audio File Recorders|Audio & Multimedia::CD Burners|Audio & Multimedia::CD Field.Name: Program_Specific_Category
Field.Title: Specific Category
Field.ShortDescription: Overall category that best fits the application, DEPRECATED
Field.RegExDocumentation: Category identifier, must be selected from list

Field.Name: Program_System_Requirements
Field.Title: Requirements
Field.ShortDescription: Minimum system requirements

Field.Name: Keywords
Field.Title: Keywords
Field.ShortDescription: Keywords to be used to describe the program, comma delimited

Field.Name: Char_Desc_45
Field.Title: 45 character description
Field.ShortDescription: 45 character description of the program (no HTML)
Field.RegExDocumentation: Single line (no breaks, no HTML) text string 0-45 characters

Field.Name: Char_Desc_80
Field.Title: 80 character description
Field.ShortDescription: 80 character description of the program (no HTML)
Field.RegExDocumentation: Single line (no breaks, no HTML) text string 0-80 characters

Field.Name: Char_Desc_250
Field.Title: 250 character description
Field.ShortDescription: 250 character description of the program (no HTML)
Field.RegExDocumentation: Single line (no breaks, no HTML) text string 0-250 characters

Field.Name: Char_Desc_450
Field.Title: 450 character description
Field.ShortDescription: 450 character description of the program (no HTML)
Field.RegExDocumentation: Single line (no breaks, no HTML) text string 0-450 characters

Field.Name: Char_Desc_2000
Field.Title: 2000 character description
Field.ShortDescription: 2000 character description of the program (no HTML)
Field.RegExDocumentation: Multiple lines (no HTML) text string 0-2000 characters

Field.Name: Application_Info_URL
Field.Title: Application info URL
Field.ShortDescription: URL used to point people to get more information about the program

Field.Name: Application_Order_URL
Field.Title: Ordering URL
Field.ShortDescription: URL used to point people to order the program

Field.Name: Application_Screenshot_URL
Field.Title: Screenshot URL
Field.ShortDescription: URL used to access a screenshot of the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL http:// + 2-120 characters with extension gif, jpg, or png

Field.Name: Application_Icon_URL
Field.Title: Icon URL
Field.ShortDescription: URL used to access the icon image (32x32 pixels) used for the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL http:// + 2-120 characters with extension gif, jpg, or png

Field.Name: Application_XML_File_URL
Field.Title: PAD file URL
Field.ShortDescription: URL used to access the PAD file in the future
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL http:// + 2-120 characters with extension xml

Field.Name: Primary_Download_URL
Field.Title: Download primary URL
Field.ShortDescription: Primary download URL where customers can download the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL ftp or http:// + 2-120 characters with extension exe, zip, or other

Field.Name: Secondary_Download_URL
Field.Title: Download secondary URL
Field.ShortDescription: Secondary download URL where customers can download the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL ftp or http:// + 2-120 characters type=exe, zip, or other

Field.Name: Additional_Download_URL_1
Field.Title: Download other URL 1
Field.ShortDescription: An additional download URL where customers can download the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL ftp or http:// + 2-120 characters with extension exe, zip, or other

Field.Name: Additional_Download_URL_2
Field.Title: Download other URL 2
Field.ShortDescription: Another download URL where customers can download the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: URL ftp or http:// + 2-120 characters with extension exe, zip, or other

Field.Name: Distribution_Permissions
Field.Title: Distribution permissions
Field.ShortDescription: Distribution permissions given by the author to vendors and other distributors
Field.RegExDocumentation: Multiple lines (no HTML) text string 0-2000 characters

Field.Name: EULA
Field.Title: EULA
Field.ShortDescription: End User License Agreement for the program
Field.RegExDocumentation: Multiple lines (no HTML) text string 0-20000 characters
